title: The Journey to the Southern Wastelands
description: After departing from the Lang Tribal Clan of the Eastern Wilds, Feng Yu and the others had set out on a lone journey towards the Southern Wastelands, venturing towards the various routes of the Southern Pass, separately. Feng Yu took on the temporary identity of a wandering swordsman, but will it be enough to shield him from the unyielding Midnight Temple assassins, or even the various Major Factions and bounty hunters that are out for his head?Find out now, in the story that continues in the form of an epic quest!
author: Shadows Finger
